meanings.meaning: place to put your foot when climbing

examples: He found a secure foothold and pulled himself up. scrabbling for a foothold on the steep grassy bank
The bench gave me the foothold I needed to climb into the tree.

meanings.meaning: strong position for making further progress

examples: The company is trying to gain a foothold in the European market.
I hope the textbook will provide a foothold for students of the subject.
The firm has a firm foothold in this market.
